Introduction.intro: The Best Developer in Batam by Property & Bank Award, with more than 34 years of experience since 1989 in building 3889 of your dream homes. Central Group has successfully developed several well-known projects with a total land area of ​​more than 200 Ha in Batam City, some of which are in collaboration with national developers such as Alam Sutera and TDW Property affiliates. Central Group adheres to the values ​​and responsibilities towards property owners, investors, management, the community, the surrounding environment and all staff.
